## isCrossOver variable

Returns true if line A rises up over B.

```ts
b1  a2
  \/
  /\
a1  b2

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isCrossOver: (a1: number, a2: number, b1: number, b2: number) => boolean
```
